name: Beneath the Surface (itch) (Beneaththesurface)
description:
Beneath the Surface - A Ludum dare game. (#LD29)

Wander beneath the surface and explore a mysterious tomb. Overcome your enemies and prove that you are the greatest hero of them all.

"One thing that obviously scares off many people is the difficulty in gameplay. It is very tight and unforgiving, but with practice comes perfection."
